title: Pixel 3: when using Microsoft Teams for calls my voice is robotic during the start of the call
content:
The issue does not occur during phone calls - only with microsoft teams calls.
This occurs both with and without a cord headset.
Turning off wifi seems to reduce the problem.

I have restarted the phone, reinstalled teams and updated the phone, but the issue with poor audio quality the first 10-20 seconds of Teams meetings remains. My voice breaks up and becomes robotic. I can hear my meeting participants fine.
